title: No results found when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), no results are found. It should be noted that searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly. Additionally, the search functionality should prioritize getting the Java element and if that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
OB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are found.
EB: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the relevant search results.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Use the selection and dialog to search for declarations.
3. Observe that no results are found.

To verify the expected behavior:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Right-click on a package and select the search option from the context menu.
3. Confirm that the search works correctly and displays the relevant results.
Notes: It should be noted that the search functionality should prioritize getting the Java element and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
